Name: Finger Football: Goal in One
About the game: Finger Football: Goal In One is a minimalist finger football puzzle game. 70 levels designed to challenge you; Levels with increased button strength ; 2 types of 'enemy buttons'; 6 custom fields for you to choose what you prefer; 2 different goal sizes; Will you be able to find the right strength and angle for each of the 70 levels?
